Text: Is this the Movie? V for Vendetta by Alan Moore?
This is the old comic that the movie is based on.

Ahh, and i almost forgot...
If you like Alan Moore you should REALLY read his even more brilliant comic - "Promethea". Pure art at its best, highly recomended indeed:
http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3370021

Kickin UL d00d!

and it got about 4000 snags in the first 24 hours.
Thx Again! Let's click those banners mateys!  Hyargh! Captain Anakata's orders!

gosh people, if you need the movie type it into the movie section. i'm sure axxo has a good version of it... you're better off finding it yourself than asking for it in the comics section.

Nice torrent, great comic, if your any type of leftist (anarchist, communist, et. al) pretty nice read. Makes me mad at the movie though, they really 'did' screw it up.
ThePirateBay prevails.
